debugger.name: The Debugger
debugger.description: A skill only used when the developers need to test something. Unobtainable.

front_attack.name: Front Attack
front_attack.description: A basic attack where the caster charges forward.

acid_spin.name: Acid Spin
acid_spin.description: A spin attack that spits acid.

slash.name: Slash
slash.description: A simple vertical slash, classic but reliable.

purification.name: Purification
purification.description: A purification spell that heals all allies.

gust.name: Gust
gust.description: A buff that increases the caster's speed.

haste.name: Haste
haste.description: A buff that increases the speed of all allies.

toxic_spite.name: Toxic Spite
toxic_spite.description: A spell that deals damage and poisons the target.

shadow_slash.name: Shadow Slash
shadow_slash.description: A slash that deals damage and lowers the target's defense.

fire_arrow.name: Fire Arrow
fire_arrow.description: An arrow that deals damage and burns the target.

fallen_lionheart_slash.name: Fallen Lionheart's Slash
fallen_lionheart_slash.description: A powerful slash that deals tremendous damage and poisons them.

machette.name: Machette
machette.description: A simple but reliable coup, does double damage if the enemy is below 15% health.

circular_swing.name: Circular Swing
circular_swing.description: A swing that deals damage to all enemies.

holy_guard.name: Holy Guard
holy_guard.description: A buff that increases the target's defense.

holy_thrust.name: Holy Thrust
holy_thrust.description: Consumes 10 holy gauge to increase its damage

restless_stab.name: Restless Stab
restless_stab.description: A flashing stab that deals more damage if the caster is faster than the target.

sand_sweep.name: Sand Sweep
sand_sweep.description: The caster sends a sand wave that slows the enemy.

quick_slash.name: Quick Slash
quick_slash.description: A slash optimized to surprise the enemy by its speed.

poison_bite.name: Poison Bite
poison_bite.description: An attack designed to poison the target.

wind_spell.name: Wind Spell
wind_spell.description: The most basic magic spell, deals damage.

brush_cut.name: Brush Cut
brush_cut.description: A basic paint skill that uses paint to increase its damage.

decoloration.name: Decoloration
decoloration.description: Uses a paint technique to remove paint from the target and lower its intelligence.

splatter.name: Splatter
splatter.description: An all-out paint attack that deals damage if the target has a least 2 paint layers.

paint_festival.name: Paint Festival
paint_festival.description: Sends paint in every direction, painting everyone on the battlefield

blood_needle.name: Blood Needle
blood_needle.description: Sacrifices some of your health for damage

life_bulb.name: Life Bulb
life_bulb.description: A healing spell that heals lightly the caster.

hemoglojab.name: Hemoglojab
hemoglojab.description: A basic magic attack that deals damage and lowers the target's defense.
